column4: Hello can someone help me install themes for Lubuntu. I have the theme extracted ina  folder in .themes but it's not showing up in the Theme 'program'
When I type 'ls' in the .themes folder both the themes are highlighted in green, what does this mean and does it play a role
What should I do to make it usuable then
I assume it's maverick-meerkat-icon and -themes you want to use ?
Yes but it extracted to Ambiance-10.10
you are also putting them in "downloads/themes"
My taskbar is flashing and crashing all over the place.
